Bulbbul

2020 | 1h 49m | Drama

A child bride grows up to be an enigmatic woman presiding over her household, harboring a painful past as supernatural murders of men plague her village.

Starring: Triptii Dimri,Avinash Tiwary,Rahul Bose

Watch all you want.

Bulbbul | Official Trailer | Tripti Dimri, Rahul Bose, Avinash Tiwary | Netflix India

A story set in the late 19th Century Bengal, Bulbbul traverses the journey of a young girl from innocence to strength, as the legend of a chudail casts a looming shadow over her world.

Bulbbul is a supernatural thriller produced by actor & producer Anushka Sharma & Karnesh Ssharma (Clean Slate Filmz), along with being directed by Anvita Dutt.
